channel.title: Gaelic on mostlymaths.net
channel.description: Recent content in Gaelic on mostlymaths.net

item.title: February, March and April Challenge: Language Learning Applied to Gaelic
item.description: From my cheap dictionary As a byproduct of The Language Switch, I was invited to send a guest post to Bitesize Irish Gaelic, a wonderful site where you can learn Irish gaelic online. Last year I decided to learn Icelandic because we were going to Iceland, this year I was learning Gaelic… Thus we decided that Ireland might be a good place to visit this summer on holidays, encouraging me to learn better this new language.
